messages.title: Voter Beware!
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats and Conservatives have run Ipswich Borough Council together since 2004. Tories have never had a majority on the council - the only way they have stayed in power is with the votes of the Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tories supported by the Lib Dems in Ipswich have closed area housing offices, a film theatre, and the Corn Exchange for half the year. They've also started selling off the council's share in Ipswich Buses and cut the roads maintenance budget.
Prioritised luxury flats over affordable family homes and done nothing as town centre shops stand empty.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: National Tory Policies Supported by Lib Dems
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting tax credits, scrapping Child Trust Funds, restricting the use of DNA evidence to catch criminals, and cutting the Train To Gain employee education programme.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Liberal Democrats means the Tories win.

housing.content: Prioritised luxury flats over affordable family homes.

quotes.text: Liberal Democrat Leader Nick Clegg wants to cut public services even more than the Tories and is on record as saying he will make 'savage cuts'.

images.caption: Vote Labour - Only Labour Can Beat The Tories in Ipswich
